Name: Jenever Punch
Ingredients: 15 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP up with soda.
Review: A more complex riff of a Collins with malty genever and brown sugar flavours considerably adding to the drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Jenever Punch contains 127 calories
